dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.databinding

Class MementoOperationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.databinding.MementoOperationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dreisoft.tresos.lib2.job.operations.IOperationExecutor

    public class MementoOperationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements dreisoft.tresos.lib2.job.operations.IOperationExecutor
    This is the main class to perform memento operations. Undo/Redo support is only guaranteed if this class is used to perform operations on a memento.

    The MementoOperationHandler can be queried from the AbstractBackend: 

     MementoOperationHandler handler backend.getMementoOperationHandler();
 handler.setBoolean( "BooleanMemento", true );

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

      • beginTransaction

        public boolean beginTransaction(java.lang.String label)
                         throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Create a new transaction to which operations are queued until commitTransaction() or rollbackTransaction() is called.
        IMPORTANT! In order to not get a deadlock, make sure to always call either commitTransaction() or rollbackTransaction() to finish the transaction.
        Note that if any of the AbstractMementoOperations executed in the transaction results in a faulty APIOperationStatus, then the transaction will be rolled back automatically during commitTransaction() .

        Example: 
         handler.beginTransaction("myTransaction");
 try
 {
     // execute your operations
     ...
 }
 finally
 {
     handler.commitTransaction(); // will actually do a rollback on any error
 }
        Transactions cannot be nested.
        Parameters:
        label - A human readable label
        Returns:
        false on error
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - in case of an error
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getTransactionLabel

        public java.lang.String getTransactionLabel()
        Get the label of the currently running transaction or null if none is running.
        Returns:
        The label
        Since:
        2009.a

      • commitTransaction

        public boolean commitTransaction()
                          throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Execute a previously started transaction.
        Note that if any of the AbstractMementoOperations executed in the transaction results in a faulty APIOperationStatus, then the transaction will always be rolled back thereby.
        Returns:
        false on error
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - in case of an error
        Since:
        2009.a

      • rollbackTransaction

        public boolean rollbackTransaction()
                            throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Rollbacks a previously started transaction.
        Returns:
        false on error
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - in case of an error
        Since:
        2009.a
